javascript:(function()%7B!function()%7B%22use%20strict%22%3Bwindow._TOGGLELIGHT%7C%7C(window._TOGGLELIGHT%3D%7BisEnabled%3A!1%2ClightSaved%3A!1%2ClightLegacy%3Anull%2ClightEnabled%3Anull%2ClightOnDrop%3Anull%7D)%2Cwindow._TOGGLELIGHT.enable%3D()%3D%3E%7Bif(console.log(%22window._TOGGLELIGHT%22%2Cwindow._TOGGLELIGHT)%2Cwindow._TOGGLELIGHT.lightSaved)%7Btry%7BCampaign.pages.models%5BCampaign.activePageIndex%5D.d20.dyn_fog.enabled%3Dwindow._TOGGLELIGHT.lightLegacy%7Dcatch(i)%7B%7Dtry%7Bwindow.Campaign.engine.engineStore._p.state._value.vttTools_pageSettings.dynamicLightingEnabled%3Dwindow._TOGGLELIGHT.lightEnabled%7Dcatch(i)%7B%7D%7D%7D%2Cwindow._TOGGLELIGHT.disable%3D()%3D%3E%7Bif(console.log(%22window._TOGGLELIGHT%22%2Cwindow._TOGGLELIGHT)%2C!window._TOGGLELIGHT.lightSaved)%7Bwindow._TOGGLELIGHT.lightSaved%3D!0%3Btry%7Bwindow._TOGGLELIGHT.lightEnabled%3Dwindow.Campaign.engine.engineStore._p.state._value.vttTools_pageSettings.dynamicLightingEnabled%7Dcatch(i)%7B%7Dtry%7Bwindow._TOGGLELIGHT.lightLegacy%3DCampaign.pages.models%5BCampaign.activePageIndex%5D.d20.dyn_fog.enabled%7Dcatch(i)%7B%7D%7Dtry%7Bwindow.Campaign.engine.engineStore._p.state._rawValue.vttTools_pageSettings.dynamicLightingEnabled%3D!1%7Dcatch(i)%7B%7Dtry%7BCampaign.pages.models%5BCampaign.activePageIndex%5D.d20.dyn_fog.enabled%3D!1%7Dcatch(i)%7B%7D%7D%2Cwindow._TOGGLELIGHT.initialize%3D()%3D%3E%7B%24(%22.r20-draggable-element%22).remove()%3Blet%20i%3D%24(%22body%22).append('%3Cdiv%5Cr%5Cn%5Ctclass%3D%22ui-dialog%20ui-widget%20ui-widget-content%20r20-draggable-element%20ui-corner-all%20initiativedialog%20ui-draggable%20ui-resizable%20ui-dialog-buttons%22%5Cr%5Cn%5Ctstyle%3D%22position%3A%20fixed%20!important%3B%20top%3A%2050%25%3B%20left%3A%2050%25%3B%20z-index%3A%2020000%20!important%22%5Cr%5Cn%3E%5Cr%5Cn%5Ct%3Cdiv%20class%3D%22ui-dialog-titlebar%20ui-widget-header%20ui-corner-all%20ui-helper-clearfix%20ui-draggable-handle%22%3E%5Cr%5Cn%5Ct%5Ct%3Cspan%20id%3D%22ui-id-10%22%20class%3D%22ui-dialog-title%
